title: Interpretation of a dream about engaging in incest in a dream

preview.html: Seeing my sister dreaming or my mother or aunt holding the Qur’an for the mother Watching my book written about my relatives and the interpretation of the engagement dream of a single married pregnant girl and a man about Ibn Sirin and others Interpretation of engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin Engagement in a dream is one of the dreams that cause great joy and happiness for unmarried men or women, and this portends a lot of good for a person or a close marriage, such as engagement is one of the important aspects of marriage between a man and a woman, which takes place before marriage, and the formality, through which the two people know each other’s qualities and other things that must be available in marriage and courtship, and the Islamic religion and all heavenly religions have legislated it and it is very important before marriage and it is preferable that the engagement does not extend to the period before marriage. Interpretation of incestuous engagement in a dream If a man sees that he is writing his book about a mahram such as his sister, aunt, aunt, mother, grandmother, or stepmother, then he has an excellent position in his family, and whoever wrote the book for him to the dead. From his mahram reaches her stomach and if she is alive and hates to approach her in his sleep; Because he will cut off his mercy, visitation and tenderness. And courtship is the dream of every teenage girl and boy seeking to start a family. Interpretation of engagement in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her engagement is done in a dignified and distinctive way and without mistakes, this is evidence of her lack of passion. Proceeding to give your lover a gift in a dream is evidence of approaching someone in reality and loving him intensely. If an unmarried girl sees that she is engaged in a dream and that her engagement has been completed, this is evidence that she will marry a distinguished and useful man. The engagement of a girl in a dream by someone close to her is a sign of upcoming problems in her life. Canceling the engagement in a dream for engaged people is evidence that she will receive food, joy and help, but if her fiancé appears sad in the dream, this is evidence of the happiness that will come to them in reality. Seeing a girl, one of his relatives, who wants to marry her in a dream, is a sign of joy and happiness that comes to her. Interpretation of engagement in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman in a dream proposing to her is evidence of the arrival of good and the end of worry. A married woman seeing that she Engaged to someone other than her husband is evidence of peace of mind and comfort for her husband. Seeing a married woman preparing to attend her engagement party is evidence of the affection between her and her husband. Interpretation of engagement in a dream for a man A man who sees that he is about to propose to a girl he really knows is evidence of achieving the goals and desires he was looking for. O poor man, if he sees himself proposing to a girl he does not know, this is evidence that he will die. Seeing a rich man proposing to a girl he does not know is evidence that he will rise to his position. A girl proposing to a young man is evidence of extending his livelihood. Proposing marriage to a notorious adulterous girl is evidence of his bad reputation. A man’s anger at the girl’s engagement and not responding to her engagement is evidence of forcing him to do something in life. Interpretation of engagement in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing the

title: Interpretation of seeing an old house in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The old house in a dream is among the dreams that have many different meanings and meanings that differ in their interpretation according to many interpretation scholars, and through this article we will explain them all in the following lines, so that the dreamer’s heart will be reassured and not distracted by many differences. Interpretations. The old house in a dream. The interpretation of seeing the old house in a dream explains that the dreamer has many good morals and good qualities that make him treat everyone around him with love and affection and does not carry any evil or evil in his heart. If the man sees the presence of the old house in his dream, then this Evidence that he has many values ​​and principles that he does not completely abandon, no matter what pleasures and temptations of the world he faces, because he fears and fears God’s punishment. If the dreamer sees the old house in his dream, this means that there are some problems and crises related to the past, and that is why he is in He was in a state of discomfort and tension throughout this period of his life. But if the house was covered in dirt and seemed abandoned while he was sleeping, this is evidence that he is a person who does not care about God in relation to family ties and does not ask or care about his family members. He will have to rethink many issues in his life so that God does not punish him for this. When the dreamer sees that he is going to his old house and arranges it during his dream, this means that he will be able to achieve many of the goals and ambitions that he has been pursuing for long periods of time and will With that. Achieving great success by God’s command. The old house in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing the old house in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get rid of all the negative and wrong thoughts that were the reason for his appearance in many sins and immorality and will return to his Lord to accept his repentance and forgive him for his sins. Everything he did before. If a man sees himself feeling his hands on every wall and piece of furniture in his dream, this is a sign that he is suffering from a lot of worries and problems that have accumulated a lot in his life during this period, and this is why. It is done in a very bad psychological state. Seeing a person touching the walls and furniture of his old house during his sleep indicates the presence of many major problems and crises that he cannot get rid of easily, and for this reason he is in a very bad psychological state and cannot. . To focus on all matters of his life, whether personal or practical. The old house in the dream of an unmarried woman. In the event that an unmarried woman sees the presence of the old house in her dream, this is a sign that she is a wise and responsible person who takes care of all her family’s affairs and always provides them with great assistance. To help them in the difficult troubles and burdens of life. A girl who sees that she is heading towards her new home during her pregnancy period indicates that she will be betrayed and deceived by the person with whom she had an emotional relationship because he is a very bad person and she should not be sorry because they will have caused this. Her big problems and crises that she could not solve or get rid of easily and will have a major negative impact on her life, whether personal or professional. If she sees

title: Interpretation of citrus fruits in a dream: Seeing citrus fruits in a dream

preview.html: Seeing citrus fruits for a single girl, for a married woman, and a pregnant woman for a divorced woman, for a married or single woman, whether they are green, yellow, ripe, sour, or sweet, or picking, eating, or cutting a lemon, or making a purchase for a son. However, the interpretation of citrus aurantium in a dream. Citrus aurantium in a dream is interpreted from four aspects: a friend was born, a dispute and taking advantage of a strange man, and perhaps throwing citrus indicates interference. Citrus aurantium in a dream is praiseworthy, denotes praise and good reputation. A herring in a dream may indicate a wealthy wife. Honorable, especially if you pick it from a tree. If a woman dreams of citrus fruits in her arms, then she has given birth to a blessed male child. As for the bitter orange, most people hate it because of the origin of its name, and it can indicate a heavy and weak person who suffers from many diseases and can be stubborn in something he intended. A wreath of The color orange, if a woman puts it on her head, she will marry a good and religious man. A lemon in a dream can indicate a fruitful and healthy year, especially if it is green. Throwing a jellyfish at someone in a dream means asking for participation. Any woman who gives it turquoise in a dream may have a son. Eat citronella in A dream indicates an amount of money, and one of the names of citrus fruits is narration, and this word can contain two words, narration and fugitive, meaning one escapes from the fire, and the presence of citrus fruits in a dream can indicate safety and good health. Citron in a dream by Ibn Sirin. One lemon in a dream indicates the presence of Born, many of which refer to praise or kind words. On the authority of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, that he said: The likeness of the believer who recites the Qur’an is like the smell of a hammer, because it smells good and tastes good. In praise of his people, the poet sang: As if they were lemons. Among the expressions of hatred for citrus fruits in and through the dream are the following: Citrus fruits in a dream indicate hypocrisy, because their appearance is contrary to their essence. As for most narrators, they said: Oranges and citrons are all good in visions. Eating citrus indicates Sweets in a dream indicate saved or amounted money. The green color in the interpretation indicates a year in which there is fertility and growth and can also indicate the health of the body and the patient’s recovery. If the sleeper sees that he is reaping its fruits, then it heralds a good year in which he will rest and reap the fruits of his effort and hard work. As for The yellow color indicates the fertility of the year with diseases. It was said in other places: The etrog in a dream shows a foreign woman, and it can also show honor, pride, or wealth. If he dreams that he is cutting a lemon into two parts, then he will have a daughter and a son. And if a woman sees in her dream a crown of citron flowers on her head. In that year, she will marry a man or a young man whose religion is good and who is well known among the people. As for the married or pregnant woman who sees in her dream a concussion in her arms, she will give birth to a son, God willing. As for the man who dreams that his wife gives him citronella, he will also have a son. And the person Whoever sees in a dream or vision as if someone is throwing or hitting him with a sting, then this is a sign of their kinship. Citron under the citron in the chapter on praise and above it.

title: Interpretation of dreams about my sister-in-law holding my penis in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about my sister-in-law holding my penis in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about my sister-in-law holding my penis in a dream. To reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of dreams of my wife’s sister holding my penis in a dream. In the event that the wife’s sister is seen holding a man’s penis in a dream, this may indicate rejection of a major problem they suffered from in the previous period. And if the man sees this vision, it may indicate Positive changes occurred in his life in those days, and God knows best. This vision could also indicate the strength of the relationship between them and the sister’s closeness to the family to a great extent, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband’s sister’s hair is close to the dream: seeing my sister-in-law’s hair was very short. This indicates that she was bearing a lot of responsibilities at that time, and God knows best. A woman’s dream that her sister-in-law has short hair like men may indicate her ability to make some important decisions in her life during those days. It is possible that seeing her sister-in-law’s hair very short may indicate It indicates the realistic changes taking place in her life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of my husband’s sister wearing a white dress in a dream. Seeing her husband’s sister wearing a white dress in a dream may indicate good circumstances and good changes occurring in her life. In the event that a woman sees that her husband’s sister She was wearing a white dress, as this may indicate that the financial situation has significantly improved during this period. If a woman sees that her husband’s sister was wearing a wedding dress in a dream, this may indicate good events that will happen to him in those days and positive changes, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing a sister The husband wearing a white dress in a dream indicates the joys that come to us during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a sister-in-law’s gift in a dream: In the event that one sees receiving a gift from the husband’s sister in a dream, this may indicate great love and affection between them at that time. Dreaming of a gift from her husband’s sister in a dream can indicate the strength of the relationship and strong solidarity between the family thanks to God. If a woman sees that her husband’s sister is giving her a gift, this may mean that she will receive a lot of money, livelihood and money during this period. In the event that the woman sees that Her husband’s sister gave her a gift that could indicate changes in circumstances that could happen to the one who had the vision positively, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of my husband’s sister’s engagement in a dream. It is possible that seeing my husband’s sister’s engagement in a dream indicates the ample sustenance that will come to them at that time. If a woman sees that her husband’s sister is engaged, this may indicate pregnancy and the birth of some children in those days, thanks to God. If a woman sees that her husband’s sister dreams, this may mean that she will enter a new phase in her life in those days, thanks to God. And in the event that she sees A woman is engaged to her husband’s sister in a dream. This may indicate the joys and happiness that the woman was enjoying at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my wife without a hijab in a dream: In the case of a dream about a sister-in-law who was without a hijab.

title: Interpretation of seeing an old man in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing an old woman in a dream is considered a praiseworthy vision in most cases, as the old woman refers to the world and can also indicate deception, as the interpretation of the dream varies depending on the form in which it is the old woman, as well as the difference in interpretation depending on the social situation in which The dreamer is present in it, and in this dream he will give you many interpretations of this dream. Interpretation of seeing the old man in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing the old man in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing the old man in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates many different interpretations, which we will tell you about as follows: If the dreamer sees an old woman in a dream, this indicates that there are many changes that will happen to the dreamer, whether for good or not. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing an old man sometimes indicates the coming goodness that the dreamer will enjoy and his way out of distress is sustenance. The broadest. If one sees that an old woman has turned into a young woman, this indicates the person’s optimism about the new life in general. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an old man in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing an old man in a dream for a single woman indicates many different expressions. Which we will explain below: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she sees an old woman, this indicates a lot of happiness that she will have in her next life. But if an unmarried woman sees an old woman entering her house, this is a sign that she will get married soon and succeed in her studies or Her work. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. The interpretation of seeing an old woman in a dream for a married woman. Of course the dream varies from one case to another, and below we will show you the interpretation of the dream of an old woman about a married woman as follows: If a married woman sees that she sees an old woman, this indicates that she will accept an illness or illness. A financial crisis, but if she sees an old woman who has died, this indicates that she has overcome this difficulty. Also, seeing an old woman in a dream for a married woman indicates the approaching date of her pregnancy and bringing happiness and joy to her entire family. See also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an old woman in a dream about A pregnant woman: When a pregnant woman sees an old woman, many interpretations appear, including: If a pregnant woman sees that an old woman enters her house, this is a sign of the good qualities of the good dreamer, but if she sees that she is expelling an old woman from her house, this indicates great sins. Seeing an old woman in a dream About a pregnant woman indicates the abundance of supply that he enjoys within him. Seeing an old woman in a dream about a pregnant woman indicates good offspring and the removal of worries. This vision also indicates the approaching date of the pregnant woman’s birth and the birth of her child, by God’s command. See also: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an old man in A dream for a man: Seeing an old man in a dream for a man is different from seeing a woman, and in the following points we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing an old man in a dream for a man: Seeing an old woman in a man’s dream generally indicates

title: I dreamed that my husband married Ali and I was sad

Interpretation of seeing my husband marry Ali and I was upset in a dream about an unmarried girl. The unmarried girl who dreams of being married, but her husband married her to another girl and she was upset. It is a sign that she will soon marry a young man, but she will not continue her life with him because of his betrayal. Perhaps the vision indicates that the dreamer will meet and love a young man and want to marry him. But she will discover his truth in time before completing the marriage, because she only wants him and her money, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl dreams that she has a man in a dream and he marries her, he is sad. This is a metaphor for the dreamer’s desire to get married, even if she gives up because of the delay in her marriage, and God knows best. This dream indicates that a major crisis will befall her husband at work, and he may be exposed to a serious accident. Or he failed in his work, and God knows best. As for a married woman who sees one of her neighbors in a dream, it tells her that her husband married her and she feels sad and distressed. It is a good omen that all the difficult times in their lives will end. She feels happy because of the livelihood and the end of her husband’s financial distress. title: Interpretation of seeing a black woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a black woman in a dream, many people are interested in the topic of dream interpretation, as many people are always looking for a solution to those dreams that they see in their dreams. What does a person see and is always looking for an explanation because it is an interpretation of seeing a black woman in a dream, as it is one of the things that a person is looking for an explanation for this vision or dream, even though he sees a woman in a dream in a good human way, and it may not differ if she is black or white Or a blonde. Interpretation of a dream about a black woman hitting me. A person is interested in interpreting the dreams that he sees in his sleep. There are many dreams and visions that a person sees in his sleep that send him a spirit of optimism and reassurance. Where he sees a woman being beaten indicates psychological problems in his life. There is another interpretation that symbolizes... Feeling of loneliness and isolation from people in social relationships. Interpretation of a dream about a marital marriage to a black woman. Seeing a woman in a dream, as is known, is considered good, a blessing, good news, and reassurance, but the cases of seeing a woman go beyond. One can see a black woman in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a black woman in a dream sees her. The person seeing her hits him sees another woman crying, and so on. A black woman in general is a sign of goodness and blessing, and the black interpretation of this is due to the many problems and fears that a person sees in his next life. The brown girl in a single woman’s dream. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream has many connotations as it indicates the interpretation of seeing a black woman in a dream, If it is ugly, it loses its beauty, so a person should think logically before making any decision, but if it is. He is brown and single at the same time, and this means that there is some anguish and suffering in his life, and he is required to overcome it with all his moral strength to be able to get out of any crisis he is suffering from. Interpretation of seeing an evil woman inside? DreamMany believe that if he sees a vision in a dream related to a woman or a woman, he may experience anxiety and distress, which is an incorrect statement and a wrong interpretation. In his sleep, he worries and fears it. In this paragraph, our dear followers, we will present to you the interpretation of a woman’s evil vision, which is that it is an unpleasant vision and not a beautiful one, as it indicates upcoming evil, an imminent illness, or a difficult psychological situation for him. Anyone who is exposed in his life, so he prays and asks for forgiveness, so that God will turn him away from all evil. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a black woman: Seeing a wedding in a dream has many different interpretations and connotations, as the person is interested in interpreting those strange dreams and strange visions that he sometimes sees in his dream. As for the dream: If a black woman is mourning with black skin, this means perfection, and commentators said: It is a harbinger of danger and misfortune, whether it is depression, anxiety, or distress to which a person is exposed. It is necessary to seek forgiveness and pray until it disappears by the command of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing a strange woman in a dream for a single woman. The translators said that the woman’s interpretation and narration were doubtful

title: I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created in a dream

preview.html: To know the correct interpretation of dreams, you can leave the vision in a comment below the link and the answer will be provided within a few minutes by our translator, so follow us.Interpretation of a vision: I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created for one girl. Interpretation of a vision: I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created for another girl. The married woman, and she was afraid of something in her life. This vision heralds goodness and tranquility. Likewise, the interpretation of the vision: I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created. In the dream of an unmarried woman, he felt sad. This is evidence of hypocrisy in this girl’s life, so she should be careful and stay away from it. If An unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is reading, then she takes refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created, and goes to sleep. This indicates good deeds and love of good deeds. Likewise, seeing an unmarried girl in a dream, her father reciting them, I seek refuge in her in the good words of God, And peace and tranquility. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Messenger in a dream without seeing his face by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of tracking. I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He has created in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream that she is fighting the jinn and reading from the Book of God Almighty, so he said, I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil What he created. This indicates the presence of enemies near her. If a married woman sees her husband reciting a verse, I seek refuge in the complete words of God from the evil of the One who created him in a beautiful and strong voice. An indication of intense fear of God and the will to adhere to religion. Hearing a married woman recite it to a woman she does not know I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created, for this is evidence that the situation has changed for the better. As for seeing a sick man reciting, I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created in a married woman’s dream. It indicates a speedy recovery and recovery from this illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams : I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Interpretation of a vision: I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created in a pregnant woman’s dream. Natural and easy elements for childbirth. While interpreting the reading of the verse, I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created in a dream. The pregnant woman. Sleeping after that is evidence of fear that the time of birth is approaching, but she and the birth are fine. Listening, I seek refuge in the complete words of God from the evil created by someone you know in the pregnant woman’s dream. Evidence of a lot of nutrition and wellness in her in the foreseeable future. Interpretation of the vision, saying: I am taking shelter. In the perfect words of God from the evil that He created inside the house in the dream of a pregnant woman, evidence of joy and happiness for her. As for the husband’s recitation of the Qur’an, I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created in the dream of a pregnant woman, evidence of good offspring. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the glorification in a dream of a son Siren. Interpretation of a vision: I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created in a dream of a young man and its meaning. Interpretation of a vision: I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He created in a dream of one young man. After that, I go to the mosque. Evidence of the end of anxiety and sadness from the dreamer’s life. Likewise, hearing the dead person seems to be still Alive and taking refuge in the words of God to you

title: Interpretation of seeing a tall person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing height in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through a website. Vision Roy2a.com Seeing a tall person in a dream has many meanings and interpretations that we talk about through our topic about a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man and a young man. What is the interpretation of seeing tall people in a dream: Seeing height in a dream indicates health and well-being and prolongs the life of the dreamer. Seeing tall in a dream indicates distinction and dazzling success in the dreamer's life and God's success in all aspects of his life. Seeing height and size in a dream is a strong message to travel to a distant land in search of a livelihood. See also: Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a tall figure in a dream for a single girl: Seeing tall in a dream about a single girl is a sign of luck and wealth in his life. Seeing a man with broad and huge shoulders in a dream indicates the achievement of everything one dreams of, or the approach of a happy marriage. Seeing tall people in a dream indicates longevity and the seriousness of the dreamer's knowledge and people's benefit from it. Seeing a tall man in a dream Wearing clothes White in a dream is a sign of joy and happy days for the dreamer. Seeing tall people in a dream indicates that the monarch is distinguished by his good qualities, wisdom of mind and kindness of heart. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dwarf in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a tall person in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a tall married woman in a dream is one of her auspicious visions in which she shows a feeling of joy and happiness, or the birth of a happy child, or strength of character and strong influence. A married woman sees a tall man entering her house Giving him food is a sign that he has a handsome son who will be fair to them, or recovery from all diseases or success in the dreamer's life. Seeing a tall married woman in a dream declares her husband's love for her and her interest in him and her family. See also: Interpretation of seeing a man's or lover's jealousy in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a tall person in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a tall pregnant woman in a dream is a sign of a handsome boy if he shakes hands with a tall man. Seeing a pregnant woman marrying a tall man in a dream indicates the coming of goodness for her and her husband with the new baby and that she will have a bright future. You can write your dream through the comments below Articles and your dream will be interpreted in detail by a specialized team.

title: Interpretation of seeing the dead come back to life for a married woman

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing the dead come back to life for a married woman, despite the great recent criticism of the science of interpreting visions and dreams in Islam, which was made through a large and strong attack by the media and questioning its affiliation. With Islamic law this year and not being recognized as academic and studied in schools, universities and higher schools, it remains and will remain one of the most important comprehensive religious sciences of Islamic law that refers to the Holy Quran. The rulings and rulings are derived from their sources of legislation, which are the Holy Qur’an and the Noble Prophet’s Sunnah. Seeing the dead returning to life Disturbing and frightening Western dreams are dreams and visions that arouse curiosity and curiosity about their interpretations to avoid anxiety and stress. On the other hand, some people are interested in searching for an interpretation of seeing the dead returning to life, as he says. Ibn Sireen . This dream shows the dead person’s desire to complete what he did before his death and asks the dumper to rise up and complete the implementation of his will. If the dreamer sees the dead person coming back to life, he cries loudly, this indicates that he is suffering from torment in the afterlife and wants to comfort him and remove mercy and charity from his soul. Interpretation of seeing the dead person coming back to life. For life while it is silent for a married woman. Some people are interested in searching for the best accurate, correct and concise explanations. The body that sees the dead comes back to life and is silent for a married woman. So she spoke that the dead person needs someone to pray for his mercy and give him lasting charity. The interpretation of seeing the dead come back to life and laugh with the married woman. There are many general contexts that the dream interpreter must know, observe and be aware of, the most important of which is that not everything seen in a dream has an interpretation that goes beyond The interpreter’s knowledge of the dreamer’s circumstances. He wanted to inform the dreamer and reassure him of a situation, but if he was sad and crying and did not speak, this indicates that the deceased must pray for him or warn the dreamer against certain actions and behaviors. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person returning home for a married woman. There are some Western dreams that cannot come true and come true, In this regard, some people are interested in searching for an interpretation of seeing the dead come back to life and return to their home, as seeing the dead is one of the visions that bodes well, and this dream indicates recovery and getting rid of diseases if the dreamer is suffering from an illness, and seeing the deceased in a dream Returning to his home to a single person indicates the approaching marriage and the achievement of goals and aspirations. In addition to achieving happiness in practical, material, social and family life, and the sky of good news that satisfies the heart. Interpretation of seeing the dead come back to life while sick for a married woman. As we mentioned previously, the science of dream interpretation is one of the Islamic sciences, and one of the most prominent general rules and principles of this science is the interpretation of the Holy Qur’an and the Sunnah of the Prophet. The honorable one. He did an unpleasant act in his life that is contrary to the teachings of the true Islamic religion because it indicates two things, the first is that the dreamer receives a sermon in his lifetime or that the dead person asks the dreamer to forgive him. And he forgives. Seeing M’s child
